data.title: bd-1gk: Deduplicate get_agent_identity calls in run_comment
data.description: Call get_agent_identity once before the thread match block and reuse the result for both ThreadCreated and CommentAdded events. Previously called twice in the new-thread path.

data.reason: Clean refactor. get_agent_identity is deterministic for a given call, so hoisting it above the match is behavior-preserving. No injection risk (serde JSON serialization), no TOCTOU, no secrets exposure. Early-fail on missing identity is marginally better.

Clean refactor. get_agent_identity is deterministic (reads explicit param or env vars), so hoisting above the match is behavior-preserving. No injection risk (serde JSON serialization), no TOCTOU, no secrets exposure. Early-fail on missing identity is marginally better â€” prevents thread creation side effects when identity is unset.
